name: Concurrent Aggregate By Key Processor
description: Concurrently aggregates by key. Only works for commutative and associative functions (ie. (a+b)+c = a+(b+c) and a+b=b+a)

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: The nodes to use for the SingleNode handler type.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: The fields to aggregate the expression on.
The actual field to aggregate on. Use dot-notation to traverse paths.

parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: The expression to compute. When calling pre-defined functions like sum(), do not enter a field name.
